com.modern.codes.lime.api

Class GlobalExceptionHandlingControllerAdvice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.modern.codes.lime.api.GlobalExceptionHandlingControllerAdvice

  • @ControllerAdvice
public class GlobalExceptionHandlingControllerAdvice
extends java.lang.Object
    * Performs exception handling for all REST API controller. This class provides exception handlers that respond to possible exceptions with appropriate HTTP status codes for the client.

    • Field Summary

      Fields
